DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Deliverables Staffing
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Hours and Fee per Typology Group","WidgetType":"pivotgrid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#efefef","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":0,"WidgetYPosition":0,"WidgetRows":24,"WidgetColumns":48,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"with TableRate as (
	select	Max(eid.UnitPriceCost) as TableRate,
			eid.UserTypologyGroup as UserTypologyGroupId
	from	EstimateItemDetail eid,
			EstimateItem ei
	where	eid.EstimateItem = ei.Oid and
			ei.Estimate = @EstimateId
	group by eid.UserTypologyGroup
)
select  IIF(eit.[Order] < 10, concat('0', eit.[Order], '. ', eit.[Description]), concat(eit.[Order], '. ', eit.[Description])) as Deliverable,
        art.[Name] as [Service],
        utg.[Name] as TypologyGroup,
        usr.[Name] as [User],
		div.[Name] as Division,
        dep.[Name] as Department,
        sum(edt.[Hours]) as ContractedTime,
		cg.[Name] as ClientGroup,
		cc.[Name] as ClientName,
		c.[Name] as FeeProposal,
		est.[Number] as EstimateName,
		IIF(n.RoleId is not null, max(edt.Rate), null) as Rate,
		IIF(n.RoleId is not null, iif(max(edt.UnitPriceCost) = 0, tr.TableRate, max(edt.UnitPriceCost)), null) as TableRate,
        sum(edt.ValueWithoutVatIncome) as TotalDeliverable,
		IIF(n.RoleId is not null, max(edt.Rate) * sum(edt.[Hours]), null) as Total,
		cast(est.[Date] as Date) as StartDate,
		cast(est.[Expiration] as Date) as EndDate
from    Estimate est	left outer join CommercialClient cc on cc.Oid = est.Client
						left outer join [Contract] c on c.Oid = est.[Contract]
						left outer join ClientGroup cg on cg.Oid = cc.ClientGroup,
						
		EstimateItem eit, 
		Article art,
        EstimateItemDetail edt	left outer join Department dep on dep.Oid = edt.Department
								left outer join Division div on div.Oid = dep.Division
								left outer join [User] usr on usr.Oid = edt.[User]
								left outer join UserTypologyGroup utg on utg.Oid = edt.UserTypologyGroup
								left outer join TableRate tr on tr.UserTypologyGroupId = edt.UserTypologyGroup
								left outer join Analytics.[Authorization](@CurrentUserId) n on (n.RoleName = 'RateCardRead')
where   eit.Estimate = est.Oid and
        edt.EstimateItem = eit.Oid and
        edt.[Type] = 2 and
        art.Oid = eit.Article and
        est.Oid = @EstimateId
group by eit.[Order], eit.[Description], art.[Name], utg.[Name], usr.[Name], div.[Name], dep.[Name], cg.[Name],
		cc.[Name],c.[Name], est.[Number], n.RoleId, est.[Date], est.[Expiration], tr.TableRate
order by eit.[Order]","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"RequiredFilters":[]}}]
